content: Hi. Is there a reason for AllergyIntolerance not to point at an observation for reaction?

We already started a discussion on this topic here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/AllergyIntolerance.20reaction.20-.20reference. The related ChangeRequest was resolved as "non persuasive".
sorry, i had a feeling of deja vu, but was not sure. Thanks
